DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To compare efficacy safety misoprostol vaginal insert ( MVI ) off-label use oral misoprostol ( OM ) . Design : Pair-matched case-control study . Setting : Tertiary-care academic centre Germany . Population : A cohort 138 woman ≥ 37/0 week pregnant undergoing labour induction . Methods : The induction labour retrievable prostaglandin vaginal insert consecutive series 69 woman compare induction use oral misoprostol pair-matched cohort . Main outcome measure : The primary outcome time induction delivery caesarean section rate . Secondary outcome include uterine tachysystole , tocolysis , fetal scalp blood testing , meconium-stained amniotic fluid , umbilical arterial pH , Apgar score .
DOC.detailed_description: Open , non-interventional study tertiary referral center Germany N/A The rationale observational study describe efficacy safety profile drug definition active labor accord local clinical practice descriptive observational study tertiary referral center . A time interval induction labor delivery depend duration MISODEL® application . By observational study investigator want describe efficacy safety regard time delivery complication rate . Primary Objective : The aim study describe time vaginal delivery definition active labor accord local clinical practice . The time period need induce delivery describe drug safety profile . Primary endpoint : - Time vaginal delivery hour patient vaginal delivery . - Length time delivery - Caesarean section rate - Time onset labor - Frequency vaginal operative delivery - Frequency abnormal CTG ( Figo ) - Frequency uterine Tachysystole lead abnormal fetal heartrate i.e . Figo P. Tachysystole define five contraction 10 minute average three consecutive 10-minute period . - Written inform consent patient - ≥18 year age - Parity five less singleton pregnancy - ≥36 week gestation - Unfavourable cervix ( baseline modify Bishop score ≤6 ) Misoprostol 200mcg VDS contraindicate accord SmPC follow case : - When hypersensitivity active substance excipients - When labour start - When oxytocic drug and/or labour induction agent give - When suspicion evidence uterine scar result previous uterine surgery , e.g . C-section - When uterine abnormality ( e.g . bicornate uterus ) - When placenta praevia unexplained vaginal bleeding 24 week gestation pregnancy - When foetal malpresentation - When sign symptoms chorioamnionitis , unless adequate prior treatment institute - Before week 36 gestation For evaluation primary secondary endpoint study , descriptive statistical method use .
